post.body: At least it gives me more leverage to get them to bed tonight. All I have to say is "Check Norad. Look how close Santa is!"
Absolutely. Our kids may grow up, but we don't have to.
My daughter got on the Norad site as soon as she woke up. She had to remind me he's already making his rounds.
Well, it's not 80 here, but 33 feels pretty darn good after -7 the other morning. And we have a white Christmas, for now.
Very nice talk. Thanks for sharing.
Good morning and Happy Christmas Eve.
Can't go to bed until I get this digital photo frame loaded with pictures for my mom. And now the stupid thing keeps shutting off.
Oh, and before the day is over, Happy Festivus.
Oh what a night it has been. Last minute shopping, wrapping, cleaning, painting. I'm ready to turn in. Have a good night.
Get 80% off gift certificates at restaurant.com. My wife and I have enjoyed many nights out with these. http://is.gd/d9k9
Study shows coffee (including decaf) affects men and women differently. http://is.gd/d7nA
Here's a "toy" for those who need a little more BS in their life. http://bit.ly/FkzG I guess these are collectibles.
"A man's life is what his thoughts make it." - Marcus Aurelius
Just noticed in TD that I'd missed some replies. I usually use Twirl. Must have a setting wrong.
Awake now, waiting on my coffee to brew. Time to get a little work done before hitting the treadmill.
Can't figure out what to get my sister. She likes crafts and craft how-to books. Anyone have suggestions for a good book in that genre?
Thought this Christmas would be different. Started shopping early. Keep thinking I'm done, but realizing I've forgotten something. Oh well.
New version of CCleaner released today. It's a great free Windows optimizer and cleaner. http://is.gd/15i0
Playing a Christmas song with a bunch of microwave ovens. http://is.gd/cYdQ
Holy cow. Even Toyota's losing money now. http://is.gd/cY5D
